```{r}
#| echo: false
#| results: asis
#| eval: false


req <- request("https://api.zotero.org") |>
    req_url_query(
        v = 3,
        include = "bib",
        sort = "date",
        style = "journal-of-ecology",
        itemType = "journalArticle"
    ) |>
        req_headers(`Zotero-API-Key` = Sys.getenv("ZOTERO_API_KEY")) |>
    req_url_path("users", "3027577", "publications", "items") |>
    req_retry()

resp <- req |> 
    req_perform()

a <- resp |> 
    resp_body_json() |> 
    purrr::map("bib") |> 
    unlist() |>
    #convert from HTML
    HTMLdecode() |> 
    # Convert html to markdown
    str_remove_all("<div[^>]*>") |>
    str_remove_all("<\\/div>") |> 
    #replace itallics
    str_replace_all("<\\/?i>", "*") |>
    #remove line breaks???
    str_remove_all("\\n") |>
    # Bold my name 
    str_replace("(Lydeamore, M\\.( J\\.)?)", '**\\1**') |>
    str_trim()

cat(paste0("- ", a), sep="\n")
```

<!-- ## {{<fa money-bill>}} Funding -->

<!-- Almost all of this funding was obtained in partnership with large, collaborative teams. -->

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| eval: false

funding <- tribble(
    ~title, ~organisation, ~amount, ~year,
    "Modelling Work in Low and Middle Income Counties in the Western Pacific Region for the COVID-19 SAGE Working Group", "World Health Organisation", 8157, 2024,
    "Modelling To Support Australia’s Resilience to and Preparedness for Omicron And Future Sars-Cov-2 Variants", "Commonwealth Government of Australia", 80059, 2024,
    "Contractual Partner to Conduct Research on Healthcare-Associated Infection Rates in Phillippine Hospitals", "World Health Organisation Phillippines", 72078, 2023,
    "Centre of Western Public Health Unit", "Contract Research", 25000, 2023,
    "Extending and comparing methods for projecting social contact matrices", "SPECTRUM/SPARK Seed Funding", 19438, 2022,
    "Quantifying longitudinal relationships between community mobility and COVID-19 case incidence in west metropolitan Melbourne", "SPECTRUM/SPARK Seed Funding", 19896, 2022,
    "Modelling to support Australia's national plan for COVID-19", "Commonwealth Government of Australia", 147536, 2021,
    "Modelling to support Australia's transition to 'COVID-normal'", "Australian Office of Health Protection", 25620, 2021
)

format_funding <- function(funded) {
    paste(
        ':::: {.cols data-latex=""}',
        '::: {.col data-latex="{0.85\\textwidth}"}',
        paste0('**',funded$title,'**  '),
        paste0(funded$organisation,'  '),
        paste0('Awarded value: $', scales::comma(funded$amount)),
        ':::',
        '::: {.rightcol .flushright data-latex="{0.15\\textwidth}" }',
        funded$year,
        ':::',
        '::::',
        sep = "\n"
    )
}

```

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| results: asis
#| eval: false

formatted <- lapply(1:nrow(funding), function(i) {
    format_funding(funding[i,])
}) |> unlist()

cat(paste0(formatted), sep = "\n")
```

```{r}
"With non-linear dimension reduction, when can you believe what you see?", NA, "Australian Statistical Conference (ASC 2023) (Wollongon, Australia)", 2023,

Association for Statistical Computing (IASC-ARS 2023) (Wollongon, Australia)", 2023,
"Higher studies webinar", "Invited speaker", "University of Sri Jayewardenepura (USJ), Sri Lanka", 2023,
"Computer Vision System for Automated Medicinal Plant Identification", "Invited speaker", "NUMBATs meeting, Monash University, Australia", 2022,
"Computer Vision System for Automated Medicinal Plant Identification", "[Invited speaker](https://github.com/JayaniLakshika/Estadistica_2021.git)", "Estadistica 2021, the Annual Statistics Day organized by the Statistics Society of University of Sri Jayewardenepura, Sri Lanka", 2021,
"Computer Vision System for Automated Medicinal Plant Identification", "[Invited speaker](https://github.com/JayaniLakshika/Vx_Tech_Talk_2021.git)", "Vx Tech Talk 2021, Vizuamatix Pvt. Ltd, Sri lanka", 2021,
"Statistical machine learning for medicinal plant leaves classification", "[Presentation](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BSs_vXKRnxE)", "17th Applied Statistics Conference, Solvenia", 2021,
"Statistical machine learning for medicinal plant leaves classification", "[Speed-talk](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mfP2LUbj0ig)", "Young Scientists' Conference on Multidisciplinary Research (YSCMR 2021) which is organised by the Young Scientists' Association of the National Institute of Fundamental Studies,
Sri Lanka (NIFS-YSA)", 2021
)

format_presentation <- function(presentation) {
    manipped_title <- ifelse(
        is.na(presentation$extra), 
        paste0('**',presentation$title,'**'),
        paste0('**',presentation$title,'**', " --- ", presentation$extra)
    )
    paste(
        ':::: {.cols data-latex=""}',
        '::: {.col data-latex="{0.85\\textwidth}"}',
        paste0(manipped_title,'  '),
        paste0(presentation$event,'  '),
        ':::',
        '::: {.rightcol .flushright data-latex="{0.15\\textwidth}" }',
        presentation$year,
        ':::',
        '::::',
        sep = "\n"
    )
}

```

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| results: asis

formatted <- lapply(1:nrow(presentations), function(i) {
    format_presentation(presentations[i,])
}) |> unlist()

cat(paste0(formatted), sep = "\n")
```
